targets.rawSql:
SELECT NOME
FROM ALTAREDE.CLIENTE
WHERE COD_CLIENTE = '1.11290'

options.content:
{{{ @root.Status}}}
STATUS DO
EQUIPAMENTO
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
select 
CASE when AcctStopTime is null 
    then 'Online'
      else 'Offline'
END AS 'Status'
  
FROM ALTAREDE.radacct
where UserName ='20171096'
ORDER BY RadAcctId desc
limit 1

options.content:
{{{ @root.tempo_conectado}}}
TEMPO DE ATIVIDADE
options.defaultContent: The query didn't return any results.

targets.rawSql:
select 

CASE 
  WHEN AcctStartTime IS NOT NULL THEN 
    CONCAT(
      FLOOR(TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, AcctStartTime, NOW()) / 86400), 'd ',
      LPAD(FLOOR((TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, AcctStartTime, NOW()) % 86400) / 3600), 2, '0'), 'h ',
      LPAD(FLOOR((TIMESTAMPDIFF(SECOND, AcctStartTime, NOW()) % 3600) / 60), 2, '0'), 'm'
    )
  ELSE '-\\-'
END AS tempo_conectado


FROM ALTAREDE.radacct
where UserName ='20222925'
ORDER BY RadAcctId desc
limit 1

LOGIN

targets.rawSql:
select 
  UserName as Login

FROM ALTAREDE.radacct
where UserName ='20222925'
ORDER BY RadAcctId desc
limit 1

targets.rawSql:
select 
  FramedIPAddress as IP
FROM ALTAREDE.radacct
where UserName ='20222925'
ORDER BY RadAcctId desc
limit 1
